channel.title: 🏢 Artificial Intelligence Research Institute (IIIA-CSIC) on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Artificial Intelligence Research Institute (IIIA-CSIC) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: An Analytical Study of Utility Functions in Multi-Objective Reinforcement Learning
item.description: This paper provides novel theoretical analyses of utility functions in MORL, characterizing preferences and functions guaranteeing optimal policies.
